summary: The Asteria Is A Dwemer Airship Used As A Player Home And Provides A Very Unique and Atmospheric Experience
descriptionHtml:
\\The Asteria - Dwemer Airship//

Thankyou to everyone who has downloaded and rated The Asteria! All of your encouragment and support means alot to me! However, I am no longer modding skyrim and have no future plans to support any of my mods.

Before asking questions in the comments section please read the question/ troubleshooting section in the description! 

Please comment and let me know what you think, all feedback and suggestions are greatly appreciated! 

The Asteria is also avalaible on the steam workshop:
http://steamcommunity. Com/sharedfiles/filedetails/? Id=18628

[youtube]scyzmJB92Jg[/youtube] [youtube]7FAYKJkhauc[/youtube]

[youtube]PwalplLpFeU[/youtube] [youtube]Vz73_f-Aboc[/youtube]

\\Description//

The Asteria is a magnificent Dwemer Airship which is a very unique player home and it is simply waiting for you to come and claim it! The Airship is located to the West of Riverwood(check screenshot) and it contains everthing you need:

- A forge
- A workbench
- A grindstone
- A chopping block
- An alchemy table
- An enchanting table
- Mannequins
- Weapon plaques
- Weapon racks
- A smelter
- A tanning rack

It also contains a bed, a heap chests and containers for safe storage and plenty of activatable bookshelves! 

Although it may not seem it but the airship is 100% lore friendly! ! Hopefully people who have played bloodmoon will see how ;) I left a book briefly describing the backstory next to the bed! 

\\Questions/Troubleshooting//
Q. The boat is invisible and I cant get to the door! Help? 
A. This may happen the first time you travel to the boat, to fix it just save and reload and the boat should appear! 

Q. Can I safely store my stuff in the chests without having to worry about losing it? 
A. Yes. Every single container on the boat is completely safe, that includes : chests, sacks barrels and crates. 

Q. The door on the upper deck wont work correctly, whats going on? 
A. Im not sure why this is happening. Me and other modders have tried to fix it but to no avail, there isnt any reason why it should work. 

Q. The mannequins are scaring me! 
A. Yeah those bloody mannequins never did stay still, unfortunately there is not much I can do to fix it, however this mod should help! 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php? Id=10652

Q. Can my spouse live with me? 
A. I havent scripted for a spouse to be able to move in. However, with this mod you will be able to have your spouse live with you. 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php? Id=11370

Q. My followers wont use the teleport statues to and from the asteria? 
A. Again im not sure what is causing this, and am looking into it! But if you enter the interior your follower should teleport inside with you! 

\\Installation//
To install just drag and drop into you data folder, make sure 'the asteria - dwemer airship' is checked under 'data files" and enjoy! ! 

\\Uninstallation//
To uninstall, simple delete 'the asteria - dwemer airship' from your data folder, be sure to remove any valubles from the home first otherwise you will lose everything! 

\\Version History//
- v 1. 0 initial release
- v 1. 0. 1
- fixed broken door on upper deck
- v 1. 1
- added navmesh
- fixed mannequin (works this time)
- removed broken weapon plaques from bedroom

My other house mods

-Dragon falls manor
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php? Id=10901

- Amazing riverwood starter home
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php? Id=8683

A big thanks to MsChif for going through and finding all the minor things that needed to be fixed! 
MATTCM919
